## MetaManager gdrive cd

Change current Google Drive working directory

### Synopsis

Set the current Drive directory for relative paths. With no argument, prints current directory. Use "/" for root, "/Folder" or "Folder" for a subfolder, ".." to go up.

```
MetaManager gdrive cd [path] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for cd
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
